scripts.deploy: yarn workspace web-app build && firebase deploy
scripts.common: yarn workspace common build && yarn workspace web-app add common@1.0.0 --force && yarn workspace mobile-app add common@1.0.0 --force && patch-package
scripts.postinstall: patch-package && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd mobile-app && expo-yarn-workspaces postinstall" "exicube install"
